install.name: YJ Images Slider V3
install.author: Youjoomla LLC
install.description: PLEASE GO TO YJ IMAGES SLIDER V3.0 MODULE FOR DESCRIPTION

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: CSS-suffix class of the module
param.description: Suffix which will be used in description of class of style (CSS) of the module. It allows to use individual style of the module.

param.name: is_copy
param.label: IS THIS A MODULE COPY?
param.description: Use this param only if you run more than 1 module instance on same page. If this is a copy that is alone on different page you do not need to define this param. You can use up to 5 copys on same page. Add suffix: _1, _2 , _3 ,_4 ,_5

param.name: swidth
param.label: Slide width (px):
param.description: Slide width (px)

param.name: sheight
param.label: Slide height (px):
param.description: Slide height (px)

param.name: sorient
param.label: Slide orientation
param.description: Slide orientation

param.name: type_slider
param.label: Slide Type
param.description: Type slider

param.name: start_slide
param.label: Start slide on page load
param.description: Start slide on page load

param.name: stime
param.label: Slide time:
param.description: Slide time

param.name: sduration
param.label: Slide duration:
param.description: Slide duration

param.name: smenu
param.label: Show slide navigation options
param.description: Show slide navigation arrows.( left ,right )

param.name: pagination
param.label: Show slide pagination
param.description: Show slide pagination.( slide 1,slide2...)

param.name: balons
param.label: Show slide tool tip
param.description: Show slide tool tip

param.name: order
param.label: Slides ordering
param.description: Slide ordering

param.name: slide_image_1
param.label: Select slide 1 image from 'upload_slides' folder
param.description: Select slide 1 image from 'upload_slides'.If left empty it will not be displayed

param.name: slide_title_1
param.label: Slide 1 title
param.description: Slide 1 title. If left empty it will not be displayed

param.name: slide_description_1
param.label: Slide 1 Description
param.description: Slide 1 description. If left empty it will not be displayed

param.name: slide_intro_1
param.label: Slide 1 into text
param.description: If using html , use only br and a tag. If left empty it will not be displayed

param.default: Mbox Video Link Options for slide 1

param.name: mbox_1
param.label: Activate Mbox for slide 1
param.description: Activate Mbox for slide 1.

param.name: mboxlink_1
param.label: Mbox link for slide 1
param.description: MUST BE VIDEO OR IMAGE LINK!

param.name: mboxtype_1
param.label: Mbox link type for slide 1
param.description: Video or image link ?

param.name: video_width_1
param.label: Mbox video width
param.description: Define video width. USE ONLY IF MBOX LINK TYPE IS VIDEO

param.name: video_height_1
param.label: Mbox video height
param.description: Define video height. USE ONLY IF MBOX LINK TYPE IS VIDEO

param.name: image_group_1
param.label: If image , activate image group?
param.description: If this param is set to yes, you can group any of your images links in a mbox image gallery

param.name: image_group_name_1
param.label: Image group name
param.description: NOTE: This group name must be set same for all images that you would like to show in same gallery group

param.name: slide_link_1
param.label: Slide 1 link
param.description: If left empty it will not be displayed. MAKE SURE MBOX IS DISABELED FOR THIS SLIDE IF YOU ARE USING NORMAL LINK

param.name: slide_open_1
param.label: Open slide 1 link in
param.description: Open link in new window or same page

param.name: slide_image_2
param.label: Select slide 2 image from 'upload_slides' folder
param.description: Select slide 2 image from 'upload_slides'.If left empty it will not be displayed

param.name: slide_title_2
param.label: Slide 2 title
param.description: Slide 2 title. If left empty it will not be displayed

param.name: slide_description_2

param.description: Slide 2 description. If left empty it will not be displayed

param.label: Slide 2 into text
param.description: If using html , use only br and a tag. If left empty it will not be displayed

param.default: Mbox Video Link Options for slide 2

param.name: mbox_2
param.label: Activate Mbox for slide 2
param.description: Activate Mbox for slide 2.

param.name: mboxlink_2
param.label: Mbox link for slide 2
param.description: MUST BE VIDEO OR IMAGE LINK!

param.name: mboxtype_2
param.label: Mbox link type for slide 2
param.description: Video or image link ?

param.name: video_width_2
param.label: Mbox video width
param.description: Define video width. USE ONLY IF MBOX LINK TYPE IS VIDEO

param.name: video_height_2
param.label: Mbox video height
param.description: Define video height. USE ONLY IF MBOX LINK TYPE IS VIDEO

param.name: image_group_2
param.label: If image , activate image group?
param.description: If this param is set to yes, you can group any of your images links in a mbox image gallery

param.name: image_group_name_2
param.label: Image group name
param.description: NOTE: This group name must be set same for all images that you would like to show in same gallery group

param.name: slide_link_2
param.label: Slide 2 link
param.description: If left empty it will not be displayed. MAKE SURE MBOX IS DISABELED FOR THIS SLIDE IF YOU ARE USING NORMAL LINK

param.name: slide_open_2
param.label: Open slide 2 link in
param.description: Open link in new window or same page

param.label: Select slide 14 image from 'upload_slides' folder
param.description: Select slide 14 image from 'upload_slides'.If left empty it will not be displayed

param.name: slide_title_14
param.label: Slide 14 title
param.description: Slide 14 title. If left empty it will not be displayed

param.name: slide_description_14
param.label: Slide 14 Description
param.description: Slide 14 description. If left empty it will not be displayed

param.name: slide_intro_14
param.label: Slide 14 into text
param.description: If using html , use only br and a tag. If left empty it will not be displayed

param.default: Mbox Video Link Options for slide 14

param.name: mbox_14
param.label: Activate Mbox for slide 14
param.description: Activate Mbox for slide 14.

param.name: mboxlink_14
param.label: Mbox link for slide 14
param.description: MUST BE VIDEO OR IMAGE LINK!

param.name: mboxtype_14
param.label: Mbox link type for slide 14
param.description: Video or image link ?

param.name: video_width_14
param.label: Mbox video width
param.description: Define video width. USE ONLY IF MBOX LINK TYPE IS VIDEO

param.name: video_height_14
param.label: Mbox video height
param.description: Define video height. USE ONLY IF MBOX LINK TYPE IS VIDEO

param.name: image_group_14
param.label: If image , activate image group?
param.description: If this param is set to yes, you can group any of your images links in a mbox image gallery

param.name: image_group_name_14
param.label: Image group name
param.description: NOTE: This group name must be set same for all images that you would like to show in same gallery group

param.name: slide_link_14
param.label: Slide 14 link
param.description: If left empty it will not be displayed. MAKE SURE MBOX IS DISABELED FOR THIS SLIDE IF YOU ARE USING NORMAL LINK

param.name: slide_open_14
param.label: Open slide 14 link in
param.description: Open link in new window or same page
